> If you could convert the .bmp to a .png or jpeg they would be a lot smaller

If I could, I would.  I'll have to see if I can find a different of saving the image.

In the meantime, I've chosen 4 settings for thumbnails: tiny (3 by 3), small (5 by 5), large (10 by 10), and extra large (15 by 15).  I can't have got extra large to be successfull yet.  Those numbers represent how big in pixels each map tile is represented by a box.  Tiny works well for just the maps, but I when I put objects on the map, . . . tiny and small aren't exactly my preferred options.
--
